game.name: ANLG_VOID™
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: ANLG_VOID is an intense horror exploration game set in the endless, shifting labyrinth of the Backrooms. Built in Unreal Engine 5.5, it delivers an eerie, lore-accurate experience where flickering lights, distant echoes, and shifting hallways fuel your paranoia. You were never meant to be here.

Built in Unreal Engine 5.5, it delivers an eerie, lore-accurate experience where flickering lights, distant echoes, and shifting hallways fuel your paranoia. You were never meant to be here.
